reference.title: steptroubleshooting
reference.shortdesc: The <steptroubleshooting> element provides a place for a troubleshooting remedy in a task step, following the stepresult. This troubleshooting remedy is intended to help the reader resolve any problems that may arise should their step result not match the result stated in the <stepresult> section of the step. The troubleshooting remedy typically contains one or more actions for solving a problem. Linking to another task is recommended for complex remedies.

note.p: Do not use <note type=”troubleshooting”> inside of <steptroubleshooting> because its meaning there would be ambiguous.

example.title: Example
example.pre:
Select Perform system backup

The message Backup successfully completed displays.

If an error message displays during the system backup, locate the error ID in the Troubleshooting Guide and follow the instructions there.

Log in to the system

The Welcome screen appears.

If the Welcome screen does not appear, try one or more of the following:

  • Verify that the user name was entered correctly
  • Verify that the password was entered correctly
  • Confirm that the maintenance contract is still active
